attributes.action: Stop the towing away of cars that are not causing a restriction
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Cars should not be towed away if they are not causing an obstruction or restriction. A ticket should be issued rather than removal of the vehicle if it is felt that the car is illegally parked.  
We require a unified approach to parking restrictions across London and for these to be clearly and properly displayed and regulated by a central body to stop councils imposing such rediculous measures without restriction.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
